title: Handy Art Little Masters Economy Acrylic Gallon, White Gesso 128 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
description: Handy Art Little Masters Acrylic White Gesso is a fine quality and economical primer that dries to a flexible finish. Ideal for the budding artist, apply gesso as an undercoating or primer to surface before painting to improve adherence. Clean up with soap and water. Certified AP Non-Toxic. Made in the USA.
